law.catch_line: Civil officers to execute process and sentences.
law.text: All processes and sentences of military courts shall be executed by sheriffs or other civil officers and such officers shall make return thereof to the officer issuing the process or imposing the sentence.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2711a-223.
